import Layout from "./layout.html.jsx"

export const meta = {
  id: "xml",
  title: "XML",
}

export const layout = (props) => <Layout currentPageID={meta.id} {...props} />

# XML

XML files can be generated by creating a file with an `.xml.jsx` extension and then exporting a React component. Everything works the same as creating a [page with JSX][pages].

```javascript
// feed.xml.jsx
export default (props) => {
  return (
    <feed>
      <title>My blog</title>
    </feed>
  )
}
```

[pages]: /pages
